page.title: 10Children's Hobbies-Horses
page.content: by Lee Ayres My favourite hobby is riding my horse. In the morning I go down to the farm to clean and groom my horse. His name is Mr. Pickwick. I call him Pick or Pickwick for short. He is 12.2 hands high. He is all brown with four white feet and a white blaze on his head. After school everyday I go down and ride him. Right now I am only just learning to ride him. I have ridden him once down to my house and back, which is about three quarters of a mile. I have also jumped him once but that is it.
